scripts.start: concurrently "npm run frontend" "npm run backend" "npm run python-service"
scripts.install-all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install && cd ../python-service && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.create-venv: cd python-service && python3 -m venv venv && . venv/bin/activate && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.python-service:prod: cd python-service && source venv/bin/activate && flask run --host=0.0.0.0 --port=8080
